trans-unit.source: Contains factory methods to create dynamic call site binders for CSharp.
trans-unit.target: 包含建立動態呼叫位置繫結器的 CSharp 的 factory 方法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new CSharp binary operation binder.
trans-unit.target: 初始化新的 CSharp 二進位運算繫結器。

trans-unit.source: The flags with which to initialize the binder.
trans-unit.target: 用來初始化繫結器旗標。

trans-unit.source: The binary operation kind.
trans-unit.target: 二進位運算種類。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> that indicates where this operation is used.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>，指出要在用這項作業。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The sequence of <xref href="Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.CSharpArgumentInfo"></xref> instances for the arguments to this operation.
trans-unit.target: 一連串<xref href="Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.CSharpArgumentInfo"></xref>給此作業的引數的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new CSharp binary operation binder.
trans-unit.target: 傳回新的 CSharp 二進位運算繫結器。
